mapper.select: SELECT chineseRank,b.stu_num,stu_name,chinese_score FROM (SELECT @rownum:=@rownum+1 AS chineseRank,stu_num,chinese_score FROM score_inf,(SELECT @rownum:=0) r WHERE exam_id = #{id} ORDER BY chinese_score DESC) b LEFT OUTER JOIN stu_inf ON b.stu_num = stu_inf.stu_num ORDER BY chineseRank ASC
mapper.update: UPDATE score_inf SET chinese_score = #{chineseScore} WHERE exam_id = #{examId} AND stu_num = #{stuNum}
